name: Diary Entry on Angles [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A torn page from a journal, covered in frantic handwriting and strange diagrams.
content_summary: The author raves about a house where the 'angles are wrong'. 'The corner of the room was not 90 degrees, but something more... something that folded into itself. I saw it move. It is not a house, it is a gateway.'
